attributes.action: United Nations to take Military action in Congo DRC.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.irinnews.org/report/100932/massacres-highlight-complexity-violence-drc’s-beni-territory

Reports that organs of those who were killed are being sold abroad.
attributes.background: This petition is to encourage the United Nations to take Military action in Congo and remove Kabila from office. Kabila and his officials have granted the massacre of many people in DR Congo and driven the country into a territory of mass violence and suffering.

rejection.details:
This petition is calling on the United Nations, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action. 

You could start a new petition calling for action from the UK Government or Parliament. We can only accept petitions from named individuals, not organisations.
